name: Cyber Pit
description:
Alpha 0.1

(No sound)

 Sypnose: Cyber Pit takes place in a Sci-Fi world called "The Pit", you a discarted gladiator and thrown away in the trash area, a place filled with the rotting remains of other surviving Gladiators, husks of their past selves. You must try to escape and regain your freedom.

--------------

 Controls:

 The game can be mostly played with the mouse.

 Esc: Exits the game.

 E: Quits

 WASD: Movement.

------------

 Important Message: The game is still on Alpha, so there are things that still need to be play tested and fixed, things that I can't know by playing myself, like the enemy difficulty, if the battles are too often or too rare. So please when you finish the game, respond to the form that is linked bellow so I can fix the game to a more playable and fun state.

You can see the progress of the game on the Trello Page bellow:

 Trello Page
